keywords.term: United States District Court For the Western District of Washington, Northern Division

org.orgName: The District Court of The United States For THe Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: /copy of within order received and due service of same acknowledged this 30thday of September, 1915.
In the District Court of the United States for The Western District of Washington, Northern Division
In the matter of the petition of Francis Stepehen Medcraf for a Writ of Habeas Corpus.

figure.p: Filed in the U.S. District Court Western Dist. of Washinngton, Northern Division Sep301915 Frank L Crosby, Clerk ByEd M Lakin 2x Deputy

div1.p: Alfred H. Lundin Prosecuting Attorney 1116-1124 Alaska Bldg. Seattle, Washington.
In the United States District Court in and For the Western District of Washington, Northern Division.
In the Matter of the application of Francis Stephen Medcraf for a writ of Habeas Corpus.

Comes now the petitioner aboce named and excepts to the decision and order of the court in the aboce entitled matter, as follows; (a) To the refusal of the court to grant the writ of Habeas Corpus as prayed and to discharge the petitioner from custody. (b) To the finding and decision of the Court that the law of the State of Washington complained of in the petition is not in conflict with the provisions of Article XIV of the Amendments to the Constitution of the United States. (c)To the finding and decision of the corut that the said law of the State of Wasington is not in conflict with the provisions of Article V of the amendments to the Constitutiion of the United States. (d) To te decsion and order of the Court reamnding the petitioner to the custody of the Sheriff of King County, Washington. AND PRAYS that the said exceptions and each of them may be allowed by the Court and made part of the record in said cause.
Attorney for Petitioner 419 Central Building Seattle, Wash.
The foregoing exceptionns are hereby allowed and ordered to be made part of the record in said casue. By the court.
